sentences.en: ...a round mirror with white metal rim.
sentences.cn: …一面有白色金属边框的圆镜子。

sentences.en: A great chunk of loose kerbing smashed into my left-front wheel, bursting the tyre and denting the rim.
sentences.cn: 我车子的左前轮撞在一大块松动的路缘石上，导致车胎爆裂、轮辋凹陷。

sentences.en: A rim of thyroid parenchyma is seen at the left.
sentences.cn: 在左边可见模糊的甲状腺实质边缘。

sentences.en: Far up the west rim of the canyon, a coyote yipped twice.
sentences.cn: 远处峡谷的西缘，一只丛林狼嚎叫了两声。

sentences.en: He looked at them over the rim of his glass.
sentences.cn: 他从杯口的上方看着他们。

sentences.en: Her glass had bits of orange clinging to the rim.
sentences.cn: 她的杯口上粘有些许橙汁。

sentences.en: Let the pastry overhang the rim and brush between the layers with the melted butter.
sentences.cn: 用油酥面皮盖住边缘，每层之间抹些熔化的黄油。

sentences.en: She looked at him over the rim of her glass.
sentences.cn: 她的目光越过玻璃杯的边沿看着他。

sentences.en: She sipped from her coffee mug, watching him over the rim.
sentences.cn: 她端着咖啡杯小口地喝着，目光越过杯沿注视着他。

sentences.en: The mother wiped the rim of milk from the child's lips.
sentences.cn: 母亲擦去孩子嘴唇上沾着的一圈奶.

sentences.en: The rim of the mirror is made of plastic.
The rim of the teacup is chipped.
The water was even with the rim of the basin.
sentences.cn: 盆里的水与盆边平齐了.

sentences.en: There is also a new steering wheel with an energy absorbing rim to cushion the driver's head in the worst impacts.
sentences.cn: 还配有轮缘部分具有减震功能的新型方向盘，以在受到严重撞击时保护司机的头部。

sentences.en: There was already a rim of dark hairs and soap round the basin.
sentences.cn: 洗脸盆边上已经有一圈黑头发和肥皂沫。

sentences.en: There's a hairline crack in the rim of that jar.
sentences.cn: 那只罐子的口沿有条极细的裂缝。

words.tran_cn: 给…镶边；沿…边缘滚动；形成边缘（rim的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 太平洋沿岸地区；泛太平洋

trans.tran_en: the outside edge of something circular
to be around the edge of something

trans.tran_cn: 环绕（圆形或环形物的）边缘，镶边
trans.tran_en: to be around the edge of something
